objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#2D4B43;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#4D7268;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E9E3D5;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#F7F2EA;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#grad2)'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='150' cy='200' r='80' fill='#F7F2EA'/><circle cx='300' cy='120' r='40' fill='#F7F2EA'/><circle cx='450' cy='280' r='60' fill='#F7F2EA'/><circle cx='200' cy='400' r='30' fill='#F7F2EA'/><circle cx='420' cy='500' r='50' fill='#F7F2EA'/><circle cx='120' cy='650' r='70' fill='#F7F2EA'/><circle cx='270' cy='780' r='40' fill='#F7F2EA'/><circle cx='400' cy='900' r='60' fill='#F7F2EA'/></g><g opacity='0.15'><rect x='650' y='150' width='60' height='60' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/><rect x='850' y='100' width='40' height='40' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/><rect x='750' y='250' width='50' height='50' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/><rect x='900' y='350' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/><rect x='620' y='450' width='45' height='45' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/><rect x='820' y='550' width='65' height='65' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/><rect x='700' y='680' width='35' height='35' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/><rect x='850' y='800' width='55' height='55' rx='5' fill='#2D4B43'/></g><path d='M 0 1080 L 540 1080 L 540 0 C 350 150 200 350 0 400 Z' fill='#395D53' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling
• 70+ Hours of Playtime
• Premium Cloud Foam Comfort

product_details.description: 🔊 IMMERSIVE LAB QUALITY SOUND: Enjoy exceptional sound quality via 40mm drivers, bringing depth and clarity to your music. With 70+ hours of playtime (40+ hours with ANC on), enjoy uninterrupted music sessions or calls. Enjoy another dimension and immersive sound with Spatial Audio, compatible with applications such as Dolby Atmos, Tempest 3D AudioTech and Windows Sonic. You’ll feel like you’re sitting in the middle of a concert or standing in the middle of a fight scene. 🧠🔇 SMART ANC AND BE AWARE MODE: Smart Active Noise Cancelation adjusts to the environment and continually learns how to best cancel noises, offering the best audio experience. Activate the Smart Active Noise Canceling to eliminate external distractions up to 35 dB or switch to Be Aware mode to remain connected to your environment. ☁️ CLOUD FOAM COMFORT: Form-Fit Earcups are ergonomically shaped to the natural outline of the ear. The 1” Cloud Foam cushions and adjustable hinges further customize your comfort for any travel, workout, or commute. 📱 CUSTOMIZE YOUR SOUND + EXPERIENCE VIA JLAB APP: With the new JLab App, customize the ANC/Be Aware settings, touch controls, and sound to your personal preference - or use the presets for JLab Signature, Balance or Bass Boost. Safe hearing option allows you to protect your ears from hearing damage with volume limits. Plus, get software updates for your product right when they're available. 🤳 CRYSTAL CLEAR CALLS: Furnished with cutting-edge noise-canceling microphones, these headphones ensure crystal clear and uninterrupted communication during calls, ensuring exceptional clarity and eliminating external disturbances for an impeccable conversation experience. 📱💻 EASY CONNECTIONS + GOOGLE FIND MY: Utilize Bluetooth Multipoint to seamlessly connect to and toggle between two devices simultaneously for added convenience. Wireless Share Mode allows you to share audio wirelessly between two Lux headphones. Plus effortless pairing with an Android device with Google Fast Pair. Plus with Google Find My Device, you can locate your headphones. 🎧 FOLDABLE DESIGN WITH ROTATING EARCUPS: Designed for convenience and portability, these headphones are easy to store and carry. ✅ SPATIAL AUDIO COMPATIBLE Brand - JLab ** Color - Sage ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and sleek layout with a diagonal split background—deep green gradient on the left and a soft cream gradient on the right. The left section includes three text layers: a large bold heading (`heading`), a futuristic styled subheading (`subheading`), and a list of product features in smaller font (`description`). Below these, a bold price (`price`) stands out followed by a call-to-action button made of a rounded rectangle (`cta_background`) paired with centered text (`cta`). The right side showcases a floating headphone image (`product_image`) over subtle square graphics, blending harmoniously with the overall composition.  

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Green: #2D4B43  
- Muted Teal: #4D7268  
- Cream: #E9E3D5  
- Soft Beige: #F7F2EA  
- Accent Mint: #C2DDD5  
- Text Dark Green: #2D4B43  
- Text White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a pair of headphones with a matte forest green base that gives it a sleek and modern appeal. The dominant color, a deep muted green (#3E5951), provides a bold yet calming feel. Highlights and shadows subtly differentiate the materials: a smoother matte for the outer casing and a textured surface for the ear cushion and headband padding in a slightly lighter green tone (#4B6A60). The logo and contour lines are highlighted with a soft contrast green-gray (#5A756A), making the design visually cohesive without losing elegance. This seamless blending of tone-on-tone greens maintains focus and sophistication.
